name: Webonise lab
role: Android Application design, development, and maintenance.
Developed UI and integrated REST API’s
Collaboration with cross-functional teams to gather requirements, design, develop and deliver,
Obtaining project requirements from the client, formulating the requirements, assigning tasks to team members, and tracking the progress.
Creating POCs for the requested functionality.
Creating a demo application and conducting small sessions.

projects.name: DataMapper InFlight for DJI
projects.project_description: Precision Hawk’s DataMapper InFlight mobile app turns a DJI drone into an advanced remote sensing tool that empowers businesses and consumers to gain actionable aerial data autonomously.

projects.name: See n Pick-Local Shopping App
projects.project_description: SeeNPick is e-commerce application based on a very simple idea to get looks present in areas around you. The main focus of this application is to get location and style together and help you shop better and faster.

projects.name: MicroSave
projects.project_description: MicroSave App provide a whole set of publication, videos, blogs and presentation published by more than 350 authors in over 13 countries.
role_and_responsibilities: Role and Responsibilities in the project:
Presenting a demo to the client

projects.name: Account Tracker
projects.project_description: This application is a platform to combine all your bank accounts and credit cards in one application. The user can view all details and transactions of the added accounts and credit cards.
role_and_responsibilities: Role and Responsibilities in the project:
Research implementation of Yodlee banking APIs

projects.name: USA Football (Teams App)
projects.project_description: Teams app is a platform for USA Football members to maintain their records along with other gaming schedules and injury reports.
role_and_responsibilities: Role and Responsibilities in the project:
Creating demo application for new functionalities and implementing in the main project
Working with senior on new functionalities
Presenting a demo to the client

projects.name: Smarter Places (Touchpoint tagger)
projects.project_description: Smarter Places application was designed to provide different businesses with one touch point to advertise, get feedback or conduct a survey using NFC tags.
role_and_responsibilities: Role and Responsibilities in the project:
Working with senior on new functionalities
